sent.orig: I shall always decide not to decide, unless of course I decide to change my mind.
sent.trans: 我向来下定决心不作任何决定，当然，除非我改变主意。

sent.orig: Decide the value of your actions. Decide the tomorrow of your value.
sent.trans: 行动决定你的价值，价值决定你的明天。

sent.orig: And the more you decide about, the decide about, the more wrong it gets.
sent.trans: 你决定的东西越多，它的错误也越大。

sent.orig: This is the basis on which we decide the orientation of China's accounting reform.
sent.trans: 这是确定我国会计改革目标取向的基本依据。

sent.orig: I'd better have a think before I decide.
sent.trans: 我最好还是先想想再做决定。
